name: Carrion Ogre
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Tied Down: While lashed to the floor, the creature is prone and restrained. It also suffers from two levels of exhaustion.

actions.Multiattack: The creature makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.
actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.
